rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.action: Agent asks if the patient is new or established.
rules.example: Are you a new patient or an established patient with us?

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Status
rules.condition: After the patient provides their status (new or established)
rules.action: Agent acknowledges the patient's stated status.
rules.example: Okay, so you're an established patient.

rules.title: Request Phone Number
rules.action: Agent requests their phone number to locate their patient chart.
rules.example: Could you please provide your phone number so I can pull up your chart?

rules.title: Confirm Chart Retrieval
rules.condition: After the established patient provides their phone number
rules.action: Agent acknowledges receipt, informs them they are pulling up their chart, and asks them to wait briefly.
rules.example: Thank you. I'm pulling up your chart now, please wait just a moment.

rules.title: Request Demographic and Insurance Info
rules.action: Agent requests their first name, last name, date of birth, and insurance information.
rules.example: Since you're a new patient, could I please get your first name, last name, date of birth, and your insurance details?

rules.title: Confirm Purpose and Check Availability
rules.condition: After obtaining all necessary patient information (new or established)
rules.action: Agent confirms the appointment purpose/type and then checks availability.
rules.example: Thank you for that information. What kind of appointment are you looking to schedule today? Once I know that, I can check our availability for you.

rules.title: Confirm Selected Appointment Time
rules.condition: After an appointment time has been identified and suggested to the user.
rules.action: Agent states the selected appointment time to the user for confirmation.
rules.example: So, you'd like to book an appointment for Tuesday, October 26th at 10 AM, is that right?

rules.title: Explicit Booking Confirmation
rules.condition: After the patient has confirmed the selected appointment details.
rules.action: Agent requests explicit final confirmation to finalize the booking.
rules.example: Great. Shall I go ahead and finalize this booking for you?
